header.thanks_for_signup: Thanks for signing up to Reacher.

get_started_saas.enter_text_results: Simply enter an email and click 'Verify' to get the results.
get_started_saas.congratulations: Congratulations üí™! We got a result with
get_started_saas.full_documentation: The full response is below, check out [the documentation](https://docs.reacher.email/getting-started/is-reachable) to understand all the fields.
get_started_saas.result_invalid: which means the email does not exist.
get_started_saas.result_safe: which means the email exists and is safe to send to.
get_started_saas.result_risky: which means the email exists but sending to it might bounce.
get_started_saas.result_unknown: which means Reacher currently isn't able to tell if the email exists or not.

step_complete.description: Your %s emails are currently being verified. You'll get notified by email once the job is done. You can also check the progress in the table below.

get_started_no_plan.title: Select a Plan
get_started_no_plan.head_to_pricing: Please head to the [Pricing Page](/pricing) to select a plan in order to use Reacher.

get_started_api.title: How to use the API?
get_started_api.reacher_powerful_api: Reacher is the most powerful when it integrates with your own tools. This is done using the API.
get_started_api.http_post: To get started, use your private auth token below, and send a HTTP POST request to:
get_started_api.unique_auth_token: Below is your unique AUTH_TOKEN. **Don't share it with anyone else!**
get_started_api.curl_example: For example, a `curl` request looks like:
get_started_api.explain_fields: The most important field to check is `is_reachable`, and you can also understand [all the other fields](https://docs.reacher.email/getting-started/is-reachable) or read the [API reference guide](https://docs.reacher.email/advanced/openapi).
get_started_api.help_no_understand: Help! I still don't understand what to do. üò±
get_started_api.dont_worry: Don't worry, I have prepared a [beginner's guide](https://docs.reacher.email/getting-started/quickstart) for using the API, with a program called Postman. If you still have questions, just use the chat widget on the bottom right corner to send me a message, or shoot me an email at [üìß amaury@reacher.email](mailto:amaury@reacher.email).

get_started_license.run_docker_setup_server: You can get started right away with self-hosting via the Commercial License Trial. Make sure you have [Docker](https://docker.com) installed, and run in a terminal:
get_started_license.run_docker_api_call: You should see some Docker logs. Running this command marks the beginning of your trial. To make an email verification, use the following command:
get_started_license.run_docker_read_more: If you see a JSON result with `is_reachable="safe"`, then you're all set üí™! You can read more in the [Install Reacher in 20 minutes](https://docs.reacher.email/self-hosting/install) guide, or skip to [Scaling for Production](https://docs.reacher.email/self-hosting/scaling-for-production).
get_started_license.run_docker_features:
Your trial Docker image includes:
- A **pre-configured proxy** from [Proxy4Smtp](https://www.proxy4smtp.com), limited to **10000 email checks** daily.
- Basic usage metrics **shared with Reacher** (anonymized) to prevent abuse.
get_started_license.run_docker_contact: Need help or customization? Whether you want to use your own proxy, increase verification limits, or have other requirements - reach out to me at [‚úâÔ∏è amaury@reacher.email](mailto:amaury@reacher.email) or book a call below:
get_started_license.purchase_license_title: Ready to Scale? Get a Commercial License
get_started_license.purchase_license_explanation: Try the Commercial License Trial with no strict time limit - I'll check in after about two weeks to see how it's going. Once you've put Reacher through its paces, upgrade to a full Commercial License for **unlimited verifications** and **complete data privacy**. After purchase, I'll personally provide your unrestricted Dockerfile.
get_started_license.thank_you_for_purchase_title: Thank you for purchasing the Commercial License!
get_started_license.thank_you_for_purchase_explanation:
With this License, you can now start using **unlimited verifications** with no data sent back to Reacher. Here are the 2 steps to get started:
1. **Use the unrestricted Dockerfile** to self-host Reacher. If you were previously using the Commercial License Trial, replace the `reacherhq/commercial-license-trial:latest` image with `reacherhq/backend:latest`.
2. **Configure proxies**. The unrestricted Dockerfile does not include any proxy configuration anymore, so you'll need to configure your own proxies. Simply fill out the `RCH__PROXY__{HOST, PORT, USERNAME, PASSWORD}` environment variables on the Docker container, or read more in the [Proxies documentation](https://docs.reacher.email/self-hosting/proxies).

If you need any help, just send me an email at [‚úâÔ∏è amaury@reacher.email](mailto:amaury@reacher.email) or book a call with me below:

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.verify_1m_emails_q: Can I verify 1 million (or more) emails?
faq.verify_1m_emails_a: If you need to verify 200K, 500K, or 1+ million emails, please check the **Commercial License Plan**. You will need to purchase your own servers separately and self-host Reacher.
faq.refund_a: Sure. If you use Reacher and find that the verifications are slow or incorrect, I'll refund you the full amount if you email me [‚úâÔ∏è amaury@reacher.email](mailto:amaury@reacher.email) within 30 days of your subscription.
faq.free_trial_q: Do you offer a free trial?
faq.free_trial_a:
If you are interested in the SaaS 10K or 100K plans, then no, Reacher does not offer any free trial. There is however a 30-day money back guarantee.

If you are interested in the Commercial License, then simply sign-up and you'll get a [Commercial License Trial](https://docs.reacher.email/self-hosting/licensing/commercial-license-trial).
faq.another_a: Feel free to email me [‚úâÔ∏è amaury@reacher.email](mailto:amaury@reacher.email), I reply pretty fast.
